gameDetails.name: CV: Promo Cards
gameDetails.description:
This is a set of three cards to mix into the base cards of CV:

Boardgame designer: spend two happy faces and two light bulbs to receive a happy face, a light bulb, and a relationship icon each turn.

Boardgame collection: spend three dollar signs to receive one victory point at the end of the game and one relationship icon each turn.

Trip to game fair in Essen: spend three dollar signs to receive two happy face icons once.
